column4: WRAPUP 5-Tesla shares reel as execs quit and CEO smokes pot on webcast
column5: Sept 7 Tesla Inc Chief Executive Elon Musk was filmed smoking marijuana and wielding a sword on a webcast  just hours before the automaker said its recently-appointed accounting chief would leave  the latest in a string of unusual behavior and executive departures that have stunned investors.
Electric carmaker Tesla Inc has seen a flurry of senior executive exits in recent months.
Sept 7 Electric carmaker Tesla Inc has seen a flurry of senior executive exits in recent months.

column4: UPDATE 2-Tesla's Musk smokes marijuana on comedy podcast
column5: Sept 7 Tesla Inc's Chief Exeuctive Officer Elon Musk provoked another Twitter storm on Friday after briefly smoking marijuana on a live web show with comedian Joe Rogan.

column4: Tesla chief accountant resigns one month after joining
column5: Sept 7 Tesla Inc Chief Accounting Officer Dave Morton resigned on Tuesday  citing discomfort with the level of public attention in the company and pace of work just a month after he joined the electric car maker.
